selected_quotes: #Nanoparticles skin absorption: New aspects for a safety profile evaluation #Nanotechnology #Toxicology -TTY:Forec…
#Nanoparticles skin absorption: New aspects for a safety profile evaluation #nanotechnology #Toxicology -TTY:gopin…
#Nanoparticles skin absorption: New aspects for a safety profile evaluation #Nanotechnology #Toxicology
A strategy for safety assessment of #chemicals with data gaps for developmental and/or reproductive #toxicity

citation.abstract: NanoParticles (NPs) skin absorption is a wide issue, which needs to be better understood. The attempt of this review is to summarize the scientific evidence concerning open questions, i.e.: the role of NPs intrinsic characteristics (size, shape, charge, surface properties), the penetration of NPs through the intact or impaired skin barrier, the penetration pathways which should be considered and the role of NPs interaction in physiological media. The outcomes suggest that one main difference should be made between metal and non-metal NPs. Both kinds have a secondary NPs size which is given after interaction in physiological media, and allows a size-dependent skin penetration: NPs ⩽ 4 nm can penetrate and permeate intact skin, NPs size between 4-20 nm can potentially permeate intact and damaged skin, NPs size between 21-45 nm can penetrate and permeate only damaged skin, NPs size > 45 nm cannot penetrate nor permeate the skin. Other aspects play an important role, mostly for metal NPs, i.e. dissolution in physiological media, which can cause local and systemic effects, the sensitizing or toxic potential and the tendency to create aggregates. This paper suggests a decision tree to evaluate the potential risk for consumers and workers exposed to NPs.
citation.title: Nanoparticles skin absorption: New aspects for a safety profile evaluation

facebook.title: Timeline Photos
facebook.summary:
梅雨が明け、四日市は夏本番。
庭のひまわりも「夏だよ海だよ紫外線だよ～」と言っております。

さて、TAEKOサンスクリーンは紫外線防止に酸化チタンを選んでおります。ナノは怖いと言う気もしますがどうなんでしょうか？

ナノ粒子の肌への浸透と透過について昨年、Regulatory Toxicology and Pharmacology　Vo 72, Issue 2, July 2015, Pages 310–322　にて報告されております。

この報告によると、4nm以下のナノ粒子は皮膚に浸透し透過することが

facebook.title: TAEKO
facebook.summary:
漸く東京も夏本番！
日焼け対策は必須です！！

時々お問合せをいただく、「酸化チタン」のお話し。

ナノって何なの（笑）


佐藤
